definition: relating to or characteristic of the passeriform birds, perching birds mostly small and living near the ground with feet having 4 toes arranged to allow for gripping the perch
details:
adjective
- relating to or characteristic of the passeriform birds
noun
- perching birds mostly small and living near the ground with feet having 4 toes arranged to allow for gripping the perch
= synonyms: passeriform bird
